mapper.sql: id, principal_name, principal_tel, role_name, parent_id, `level`, seq, conf_status, remark, create_time, update_time, is_delete

insert into sys_role
id,
principal_name,
principal_tel,
role_name,
parent_id,
`level`,
seq,
conf_status,
remark,
create_time,
update_time,
is_delete,

mapper.update:
update sys_role
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
principal_name = #{record.principalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
principal_tel = #{record.principalTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
role_name = #{record.roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_id = #{record.parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`level` = #{record.level,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seq = #{record.seq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
conf_status = #{record.confStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_delete = #{record.isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update sys_role set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, principal_name = #{record.principalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, principal_tel = #{record.principalTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role_name = #{record.roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{record.parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `level` = #{record.level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seq = #{record.seq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, conf_status = #{record.confStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{record.isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_role
principal_name = #{principalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_role set principal_name = #{principalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, principal_tel = #{principalTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role_name = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `level` = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seq = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, conf_status = #{confStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select r.id id , r.principal_name principalName, r.principal_tel principalTel, r.role_name roleName, r.parent_id parentId, r.level level, r.seq seq, r.conf_status confStatus, r.remark remark from sys_role r where r.is_delete='0'

select r.id id , r.principal_name principalName, r.principal_tel principalTel, r.role_name roleName, r.parent_id parentId, r.level level, r.seq seq, r.conf_status confStatus, r.remark remark from sys_role r where r.is_delete='0' and r.id =#{roleId}
